alert.note: Alert for La Salle; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued February 15 at 8:35AM CST until February 16 at 5:00PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Critical Fire Weather Conditions Possible Thursday... .A cold front will move across South Texas late tonight through early Thursday morning. In response, strong north wind and drier conditions are expected. The combination of low relative humidity values and strong wind may result in critical fire weather conditions Thursday. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR SOUTH TEXAS... The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi has issued a Fire Weather Watch for a combination of strong winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Thursday morning through Thursday afternoon. * AFFECTED AREA...La Salle and Webb. * TIMING...From 11 AM to 5 PM CST Thursday * WINDS...North 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the mid 60s. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
